Generation III.Ruby: Nuzleaf live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This Pok é mon dislikes having its long nose pinched.
Generation III.Sapphire: This Pok é mon pulls out the leaf on its head and makes a flute with it. The sound of Nuzleaf 's flute strikes fear and uncertainty in the hearts of people lost in a forest.
Generation III.Emerald: A forest-dwelling Pok é mon that is skilled at climbing trees. Its long and pointed nose is its weak point. It loses power if the nose is gripped.
Generation III.FireRed: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf 's grass flute fills listeners with dread.
